question: Analyze the social media engagement metrics for companies in the technology industry and identify trends over the last year.

subtasks.task: Retrieve engagement metrics from Facebook and Instagram for technology companies over the last year.
Aggregate the retrieved engagement metrics by company to identify top-performing companies in terms of social media engagement.
Analyze trends in the engagement data over the last 12 months to identify patterns or shifts in social media activity among technology companies.
Cross-reference engagement data with industry-specific innovations or announcements to correlate spikes in engagement with market activities.
Compile the findings into a report summarizing social media engagement trends and their implications for marketing strategies in the technology sector.
